com.appglu.android
Class ImageViewAsyncCallback

java.lang.Object
  com.appglu.AsyncCallback<android.graphics.Bitmap>
      com.appglu.android.ImageViewAsyncCallback

public class ImageViewAsyncCallback
extends AsyncCallback<android.graphics.Bitmap>

AsyncCallback implementation to load image Bitmaps into a ImageView using a ProgressBar while the image is being loaded.
If you do not want a ProgressBar then while constructing the class send null on the progressBar parameter.

Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
AsyncCallback
